name: Dead Behind
description:
A horror shooter for Win/Linux made for #screammachine game jam.

A mission to find OBJECT X has gone very wrong. Your squad is dead, you're immobilized, and something is coming. Luckily you got plenty of guns and ammo, for now.

- Press "e" to pick up an item or weapon.

- "r" reloads.

- Right mouse button zooms, left fires weapon.

- Survive.

This is a short demo of the DEAD BEHIND concept. We want to continue development on this game, leading to a full release with with VR support!

We're not there yet but appreciate any support you can give, feedback or donations! 

Follow us on Twitter

Thanks for playing!
